napplet
Class NApplet

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              java.applet.Applet
                  processing.core.PApplet
                      napplet.NApplet
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentListener, FocusListener, KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Runnable, EventListener, Accessible, Nit, processing.core.PConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
Animator, FireCube, MouseBlock, NAppletChainingTest.BigNApplet, NAppletChainingTest.BigNApplet.LittleNApplet, NAppletTest, SwingBlock, Throbber
public class NApplet
extends processing.core.PApplet
implements Nit, MouseWheelListener, ComponentListener

Subclass of processing.core.PApplet (Processing main sketch class.)

Author:
acsmith

Field Detail

VERSION

public static final String VERSION
Library version.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

parentPApplet

public processing.core.PApplet parentPApplet
The PApplet (or NApplet) that this NApplet is displayed on, if any.

parentNAppletManager

public NAppletManager parentNAppletManager
The object managing this NApplet, i.e., a NAppletManager being run by the parent PApplet. Remains null if this NApplet is being run on its own, otherwise the manager will set it.

nappletManager

public NAppletManager nappletManager
Manager for this NApplet's contained Nits (e.g., NApplets).

nappletX

public int nappletX
The x-position of this NApplet's display space in its parent's display, or the x-position of the NApplet's window on the screen.

nappletY

public int nappletY
The y-position of this NApplet's display space in its parent's display, or the y-position of the NApplet's window on the screen.

embeddedNApplet

public boolean embeddedNApplet
True if this NApplet is displaying in another PApplet's (or NApplet's) display space, false if it's a stand-alone applet or in its own window.

windowedNApplet

public boolean windowedNApplet
True if this NApplet is in its own window as a sub-sketch of another sketch, but not running by itself.

nappletHidden

public boolean nappletHidden
True if this NApplet has been hidden with the hide() method. Set to false after un-hidden with show().

nappletCloseable

public boolean nappletCloseable
True if the user can close the NApplet through the normal window-closing controls (whatever those may be).

nappletTint

public int nappletTint
Tint used for pasting this NApplet into its parent's display space. Mainly useful for setting the alpha channel to get translucency. Should be settable with Processing's "color datatype", e.g., nappletTint = color(255, 127) or whatever.

mouseWheel

public int mouseWheel
Current position of the mouse wheel. Starts at zero, increases by one for each "click" the wheel is rotated towards the user (i.e., "down"), decreases for each click rotated away from the user ("up").

pmouseWheel

public int pmouseWheel
Previous position of the mouse wheel (before the most recent movement of the wheel.)

mouseWheelListener

public MouseWheelListener mouseWheelListener
Constructor Detail

NApplet

public NApplet()
Base constructor. Use initEmbeddedNApplet() or initWindowedNApplet() to initialize a NApplet. Override this to have a custom constructor for a subclass using parameters (e.g., to initialize fields).

Overrides PApplet's millis() routine.

initEmbeddedNApplet

public void initEmbeddedNApplet(processing.core.PApplet pap,
                                int x,
                                int y,
                                String sketchPath)
Used to initialize an embedded NApplet. Replaces the call to init().

Parameters:
pap - Parent PApplet (or NApplet)
x - x-coordinate of top-left corner of this NApplet's area within the parent's graphic space.
y - y-coordinate of top-left corner of this NApplet's area within the parent's graphic space.
sketchPath - Path for this NApplet's home folder.

initWindowedNApplet

public void initWindowedNApplet(processing.core.PApplet pap,
                                int x,
                                int y,
                                String sketchPath)
Used to initialize a windowed NApplet. Replaces the call to init().

Parameters:
pap - Parent PApplet (or NApplet)
x - x-coordinate of top-left corner of this NApplet's window.
y - y-coordinate of top-left corner of this NApplet's window.
sketchPath - Path for this NApplet's home folder.

addMouseWheelListener

public void addMouseWheelListener(MouseWheelListener l)

true for an embedded Nit, false for a Nit in its own window (including a NApplet running in standalone mode, i.e., as a PApplet.)

userWindowClose

public void userWindowClose()
Called when a window-closing event is received (presumably the user clicking the close widget.)

setResizable

public void setResizable(boolean resizable)
Sets a windowed or stand-alone NApplet to be user-resizable. Has no effect on an embedded NApplet. When a NApplet is resized, it will call the windowResized() method, which is empty by default and can be overriden with whatever you like.

Parameters:
resizable - true if the window should be user-resizable.

exit

public void exit()
Override for PApplet.exit(). Handles things for a windowed or embedded NApplet, or falls through to PApplet.exit() for a standalone.

Overrides:
exit in class processing.core.PApplet

colorMode

public void colorMode(int mode)
Overrides PApplet's colorMode(int mode) method. For some reason, a NApplet that called colorMode(HSB) in its setup() without specifying a max range for the color values would have those ranges set to zero. (The NApplet version of the FireCube demo had this problem.) This method intercepts a call to colorMode with no range specification, checks to see if g currently has any ranges specified, fills any missing ranges in with 255, and then calls PApplet.colorMode(int, float, float, float, float) to set them explicitly.

Overrides:
colorMode in class processing.core.PApplet
See Also:
PApplet.colorMode(int)

passEvent

public void passEvent(InputEvent event)
Accessor for queueing mouse and keyboard events. Used by the NAppletManager since PApplet.enqueueXXXXEvent() is protected.

Specified by:
passEvent in interface Nit
Parameters:
event - Input event to be queued. Mouse locations need to be translated to the NApplet's local coordinates.

NApplet factory method.

Parameters:
parent - Parent PApplet or NApplet for the new NApplet.

The created NApplet.

mouseWheelMoved

Called when the mousewheel is moved. Meant to be overridden a la mouseMoved(), mousePressed(), etc.

windowResized

public void windowResized()
Called when the window is resized. Override this when you want the NApplet to do something after a resize.

inputHit

public boolean inputHit(int x,
                        int y)
Description copied from interface: Nit
Filter to determine whether to pass an input event (generally mouse or keyboard) to the Nit.

Specified by:
inputHit in interface Nit
Parameters:
x - Mouse x position (in the Nit's coordinates.)
y - Mouse y position (in the Nit's coordinates.)
Returns:
true if the Nit wants to claim the event; otherwise gets passed through to any other Nit(s) that might be eligible.

delay

Overrides PApplet.delay(). For now, this just means delay() is disabled for embedded NApplets. For standalone NApplets, this just passes through to PApplet.delay().
